subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Marco Pappa’s goal helped the Chicago Fire overcome an early red card in a 1-0 victory over the visiting Red Bulls. Fire midfielder John Thorrington was sent off in the 14th minute for tackling the Red Bulls’ Macoumba Kandji from behind on a breakaway. Kandji left the game with a sprained right ankle. ¶Marta Vieira da Silva scored two goals in the Los Angeles Sol’s 2-0 victory over Sky Blue, which played its first match in the new Women’s Professional Soccer league at TD Bank Ballpark in Bridgewater, N.J. sky JACK BELL.
